title: Public Cloud Clusters
description: Palette supports provisioning and end-to-end lifecycle management of Kubernetes clusters (workload clusters) on various public cloud environments. Palette supports provisioning new clusters on public clouds using the cloud provider's infrastructure by provisioning new VMs for control plane and worker pools and through their managed Kubernetes services such as EKS, AKS, GKE, and more.

frontMatter.title: Public Cloud Clusters
frontMatter.metaTitle: Creating new clusters on Spectro Cloud
frontMatter.metaDescription: The methods of creating clusters for a speedy deployment on any CSP
